social.thread

Class ReactionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • social.thread.ReactionManager

  • public class ReactionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The ReactionManager class posts reactions to a thread
    Version:
    1.0 07 Apr 2020
    Author:
    Brian Goh

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReactionManager()
      Creates a new ReactionManager with a default Reaction and User DM

    • Method Detail

      • getReactionByType

        public java.util.List<Reaction> getReactionByType(Thread thread,
                                                  boolean isLike)
        Gets List of Reaction objects of likes or dislikes from the specified thread
        Parameters:
        thread - the Thread object to get reaction from
        isLike - true indicates like reaction type, dislike if otherwise
        Returns:
        List of Reaction objects of likes or dislikes depending on type

      • getReactorFullname

        public java.lang.String getReactorFullname(Reaction reaction)
        Gets full name of the reactor of the specified Reaction object
        Parameters:
        reaction - the Reaction object
        Returns:
        the full name of the reactor

      • reactToThread

        public boolean reactToThread(Thread thread,
                             java.util.List<Reaction> oppositeReactions,
                             User user,
                             boolean isLike)
        Adds the specified like or dislike to the thread by user If the user has reacted oppositely before, the previous reaction is removed
        Parameters:
        thread - the Thread object to add reaction to
        oppositeReactions - the List of Reaction from the thread, of opposite nature from is LIke
        user - the User object of the user
        isLike - true indicates like reaction type, dislike if otherwise
        Returns:
        true if reaction is added successfully, false otherwise.

      • deleteReaction

        public boolean deleteReaction(Thread thread,
                              Reaction reaction)
        Deletes the specified reaction from the thread
        Parameters:
        thread - the Thread object
        reaction - the Reaction object to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if deletion is successfuly, false otherwise.

      • getPreviousReaction

        public Reaction getPreviousReaction(java.util.List<Reaction> reactions,
                                    User user)
        Gets the Reaction object by the user from the specified reactions, if any
        Parameters:
        reactions - List of Reaction objects to check from
        user - the User object
        Returns:
        the Reaction object user if any, else return null.
